# E-Shop Template

## Project Overview
This represents an e-commerce platform built with Next.js, Shopify, and Firebase.

## Key Routes
- /: Home page
- /search: Product catalog and search
- /product/[handle]: Product details
- /cart: Shopping cart
- /checkout: Checkout flow

## Tech Stack
- Framework: Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Data: Shopify Storefront API
- Backend: Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Functions)
